rawData.name: sonam mishra
rawData.headline: senior product manager - tech
rawData.about:
Results-oriented Product Manager with over 10 years of experience managing complex
data products and applications across finance and supply chain domains. Proven expertise
in leading cross-functional teams, optimizing product strategies, and leveraging data-driven
insights to drive business growth and enhance user experiences. Adept at managing product
lifecycles from ideation to launch, with a strong track record of improving delivery metrics
and stakeholder satisfaction.

education.school: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

projects.title: Improve delivery time transparency
projects.description: The existing delivery interface presented customers with ambiguous delivery windows ("3–5 days" or "...

starDetails.situation: The existing delivery interface presented customers with ambiguous delivery windows ("3–5 days" or "Standard delivery") without clarity on estimated delivery dates, leading to:  Drop-off at the payment page (bounce rate ↑ 12%)  Increased customer support tickets related to delivery ETA  Misalignment between actual and expected delivery times
starDetails.task: Improve delivery time transparency  Reduce drop-off rate at checkout by 10%  Increase post-purchase CSAT by 5%  Align fulfillment promises with inventory & logistics systems
starDetails.action: I led the design and launch of a “Smart Delivery Promise” module integrated into the checkout page that:  Showed real-time delivery dates based on ZIP code, inventory, and logistics capacity  Highlighted cutoff times for next-day or 2-day delivery options  Introduced “Eco Slot” incentives for non-urgent orders (reduced shipping cost)  Collaborated with:  Engineering for API hooks into logistics ETA service  UX research for A/B test validation  Data Science for delivery time prediction model refinement  Legal/compliance for delivery promise language
starDetails.result: Checkout conversion ↑ 7.4% post-launch (A/B test, p<0.01)  Post-purchase delivery-related support tickets ↓ 18%  Delivery CSAT ↑ 9 points  “Eco Slot” adoption at 22% after 2 months, reducing peak-load strain
